pullrequest.title: Expanding the functionality of the plugin framework, and introducing PluginPtr and specializations

content.raw:
Just a slight detail which confused me for a second. We've been using `dataPtr` across ignition libraries when using the pimpl pattern, but even though the usage is similar here, the semantics are slightly different, right? 

I'm fine with it the way it is, but I'd like to point it out in case other people run into the same confusion.
content.html:
Just a slight detail which confused me for a second. We've been using dataPtr across ignition libraries when using the pimpl pattern, but even though the usage is similar here, the semantics are slightly different, right?

I'm fine with it the way it is, but I'd like to point it out in case other people run into the same confusion.
